text:
Love this Church service.  Feel very comfortable and feel blessed.
People are very friendly and welcoming.
Will continue to attend service at this church
Went there to attend a BSF discussion.  It is quite a small church. Good place for small group fellowship.

Really warm and nice place. I experienced the presence and peace of God through the service and through the kindness of the people in the church. I am happy to be growing in a community of believers here.
Just visited once, but felt very welcomed. Itâ€™s a relaxed and engaging service with things clearly lead. The kids workers were great with our 4 and 2 yr olds.

Bukit Panjang Gospel Chapel (BPCG) is a wonderful church for worshippers to worship. Especially those who yearn to get close to God. It has worship services both on Saturdays & Sundays for the youths & adults as well as Sundays Schools for children & seniors. Services are conducted in both English & Mandarin.
For the heavy laden, please come. Have fellowship with church members of BPGC. Your hearts may be lifted. May God's peace be with you.
For those who want to renew their strength in God, please come. Through the sermons, you may find answers from Him.
For those who desire to serve God, please come. You may find a suitable place to serve to the best of your abilities, talents & gifts from God.
Most importantly, through prayers, your peace may be restored. Emanuel. May God's peace be with you. God bless!!
